d.f: ￹￺to hang on after being broken￻垂吊※因斷裂而懸吊

e: ￹`Ma~`sefay~ `ko~ `ca'ang~ `no~ `kilang~.￺The branch is dangling but attached.￻那樹枝搖晃著，但還沒有斷 (斷枝倒懸在樹上)
d.f: ￹￺to be hanging from one end￻一端懸吊著

e: ￹`Ma~`sefay~ `ko~ `riko'~ `nira~.￺His clothing is on crooked / or buttoned incorrectly.￻他的衣服穿得歪七扭八的 (扣子扣錯了)
